name: Diary Entry on a Dream City [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A page written in a shaky but elegant hand.
content_summary: Describes a recurring dream of a vast, alien city of green, slimy stone under a black sun. The author speaks of 'cyclopean architecture' and a 'gelatinous form' that resides in the central plaza, a being of 'infinite malevolence and antiquity'.
